title: Catalog
body: Manage banners, products, categories, collections, manufacturers, price sheets, promo codes and reviews.

title: Customers
body: Manage customer accounts, groups and roles.

title: Email
body: Manage email templates and SMTP settings.

title: Payments
body: Manage payments via PayPal, Stripe, Square, Qualpay, AuthorizeNet and PayFabric.

title: Purchasing
body: Manage vendors, cost sheets and document profiles.

title: Settings
body: Manage store, plugin and analytics settings.

title: Shipping
body: Manage shipping modes, rates and parcels.

title: Taxes
body: Manage state taxes and connect with Avalara account.
